message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice,  $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but my budget is around $8,000. Would you be willing to come down to $9,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $11,000? I'm willing to be flexible if we can find a price that works for both of us.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $11,000 is still out of my price range. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. This is the absolute maximum I can offer. Let me know what you think.
